name: <player>
string:
What… is this?
It seems like an
egg. If I leave
it here, the
wild dogs might
eat it. Should I
take it home?
 Yes          No<ask>

name: <player>
string:
Cool, I found a
shovel! Could I
dig a hot spring
with this?

name: <player>
string:
Wha…what is
going on!? It
has gotten dark
all of a sudden!

No, you found
me… I thought
no one would
find me here…
I'll give you
this, so promise
me not to tell
anyone where I
am! Please!

Please do not
tell anyone
about me. I
trust you, so
please don't!

No, no! Don't
put it down!
I'll get
smashed!

name: <player>
string:
The field is
damaged too.
Today's been a
bad day…

name: <player>
string:
Oh, no! All of
my animals are
unhappy!
